text: A (Alif) - L (Lyam) - R (Ra) - iz etikh i podobnykh im bukv arabskogo alfavita sostoyat vashi slova, o araby, i oni zhe sostavlyayut ayaty Korana - etoy Svyashchennoy Knigi, - yavlyayushchegosya chudom blagodarya soderzhashchimsya v nom myslyam, znameniyam i yego krasnorechiyu. Eto - yasnoye Pisaniye, osveshchayushcheye put' tomu, kto rukovodstvuyetsya im. Eti zvuchnyye bukvy privlekayut vnimaniye lyudey, i oni nachinayut vnimat' Koranu, dazhe yesli do etogo dogovorilis' ne slushat' yego
